website_summaries.verdict: This basic brownie pan makes the perfect snack-sized brownie with a crispy outer edge.
pros: Makes the perfect 2" x 2" square brownies
Individual squares make every brownie a popular edge piece
The pan is heavy and durable
Large enough to hold a full standard sized box mix
Easy to clean if you use cooking spray and is safe to put in the dishwasher
cons: This pan still requires some cooking spray to be fully nonstick

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Made my son a minecraft sword cake using this pan and it came out great! I used regular round cupcake liners and filled the batter halfway. All the cakes came out nice and fluffy. I had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Serving size equal to that of a cupcake
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this pan with the intention of using it for brownies! My nephew wanted a Minecraft cake for his birthday and I could not get round cupcakes set up to look nice. Enter this pan... This was perfect to make the little creepers and sword from the game. It is the perfect serving size, equal to that of a cupcake. I can't wait to use this on more of my cake orders!
customer_reviews.author: dani goldsberry

customer_reviews.title: Attention edge brownie lovers: This pan is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is AMAZING! I love the edge brownies, and this pan makes them ALL edge brownies. I'm so in love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hashu Deikus

customer_reviews.title: Square cupcakes rock!
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome square cupcakes! Worked like a charm for my son’s Minecraft themed party.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Brownies stick to pan.
customer_reviews.text: I am a pastry chef. I bought one of these pans to test them out before I bought more. The pan does cook evenly with nice edges BUT the brownies STUCK to the bottom each time I tested the pan out (3x.) Even when I greased the pan it still stuck. If you don't mind having the bottom of your baked goods stuck to the pan then this pan is for you. I however am still on the hunt for a non stick brownie pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I originally only ordered one pan and liked it so much I ordered a second one. I have made brownies in it several times......I like serving individual brownies, it's crusty all the way around. I have also used these pans to bake individual Hummingbird cakes......I really do love this pan. So far it has held up well. I do use a release spray and have no issues with anything coming out. I use Ina Garten's Outrageous Brownie recipe and they bake exactly 24 minutes, makes approximately 3 dozen, I use the muffin scoop to fill them. Same thing on the Hummingbird cakes....use the Southern Living 1999 lighter recipe......fill 3/4 and bakes 24 minutes, makes about 15.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I used this pan and it cooked uneven and then I put it in the dishwasher and the coating came off and left rust spots in each slot. I threw the pan away. Feel free to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Plemondon

customer_reviews.title: Does not make good round brownies.
customer_reviews.text: Of all of the brownie bar pans I have ever bought, this is one of them. Actually, it is the only one. The quality is good. The square shapes in the pan means the brownies come out square...no wait....yeah, they are square (had to double check). The non-stick surface is good quality and the brownies popped right out with no problem. Because none of the brownie mix sticks it is really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Trent M. Tidmore

customer_reviews.title: Does not cook evenly
customer_reviews.text: They are square - however the brownies on the outer edges are cooked fully. The ones in the center squares come out 80% cooked. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very dangerous. It makes perfect brownies. And everyone gets a brownie with corners! I’m afraid this high quality product will get plenty of use. Damn!
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: I make homemade dog food and treats, l use this pan because it's just the right size, although I cut them in halves while they are still warm and freeze them. The pan is also good for brownies with the crisp of all sides so if you like the corners, you get 'em all in one serving. it's also great for making breakfast casseroles, just the right size, and when I can freeze leftovers. Just think of all the recipes you can do - individual lasagna, storing broth or sauces in a convenient size for just one meal, and perfect for individual meatloaf! Very handy pan to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Haddock

customer_reviews.title: Makes a wonderful gift, as well as great crunchy sided brownies.
customer_reviews.text: Wondeful. Each brownie has FOUR curnchy sides, and FOUR corners! OH yes, OH YES!! In fact, I bought another Wilton Brownie Pan to give to my friend for Christmas... along with a box of Brownie Mix!! Now, THAT is a gift she will enjoy for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: E. Christina Dabis

customer_reviews.title: How did I bake before this pan?!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is amazing! I was looking at similar ones at gourmet stores, but the price of this one was reasonable enough to give it a try. I’m glad I did! Definitely use baking spray in it. I have from day one and everything comes out perfectly. Some reviews said a standard box of brownie mix wouldn’t fill all 12 spots, so the first time tried it I only filled 8 spots with a box of mix. Don’t do that unless you want brownie cakes! I’ve since used a standard box of mix spread evenly over all 12 spots and have gotten a dozen perfect sized brownies every time. Cleanup takes minutes. Highly recommend this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Nice deep well for cupcakes. You can take a regular cupcake liner and it will become square while it cooks. I used this for my daughter's Minecraft themed birthday party and made some really amazing "cake" cupcakes. I would highly recommend, it was a breeze to clean and it made perfect cupcakes. I'm looking forward to trying it with meatloaf and breakfast muffins.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lewis

customer_reviews.title: you really need to use baking spray, I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: you really need to use baking spray, I didn't use it the 1st time and the bread was sticked in all cavities. The second time I used the baking spray and worked perfectly! I baked minecraft cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Gandara

customer_reviews.title: Peeling before first use
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine and I was pretty excited. Disappointed that as soon as i opened it noticed a peel (pic attached) and when I tried to rub it off kept peeling. So quite disappointing. Portion size looks good though. Deeper than I thought it would be. Just worried now that the pan will peel on to my baked good when I'm baking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jemila Shaba

customer_reviews.title: Makes great biscuits
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make almond flour biscuits, not brownies. The shape works great for breakfast sandwiches. It works well with just a spray of Baker's Joy - nothing sticks. It seems to cooks evenly, I wash this in my dishwasher and it hasn't bothered the finish yet. I do use dishwasher powder and not tabs though. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Judi W

customer_reviews.title: We love this pan!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this pan to make individual breakfast omelets. But it does so much more. My daughter and I are on Weight Watchers, so portions are very important. This pan helps with that. We've made individual sugar free cakes, mini corn breads, and mini quick breads. They always come put beautifully. We still spray the pan to ensure that they release completely. But we probably don't even need to do that. As a bonus everything has its own wonderful crusts to make everything so much more delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Teri B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a Win for Square Cupcake Making!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a perfect pan in order to make square shaped cupcakes and this fit the bill perfectly! I wouldn't have been able to achieve the look I wanted for my cupcake-cakes without this pan. Just a tip for anyone looking to use the standard round baking cups in this pan: make sure to press in the paper mold against the pan to give the paper the square shape, otherwise you will end up baking round cupcakes in a square pan anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Ended up paying the slightly higher price for the Premium
customer_reviews.text: Brownies came out looking nice, and it did create the “all edge” brownies that I was going for, but even oiling the pan before use, the brownies required serious manipulation to get out of the pan, even after they were completely cool. Ended up returning in favor of the Perfect Results Premium Wilton pan which seemed to work slightly better, though still not completely nonstick.
customer_reviews.author: AHW

customer_reviews.title: Everybody got four sides on the best part of meatloaf - the crusty part
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my soon-to-be daughter-in-law and she made individual meat loaves. Everybody got four sides on the best part of meatloaf - the crusty part. I bought this one for myself and have used to make individual brownies using the square liners. They look amazing - like a gourmet bakery. Can't wait to try the meat loaf for myself - I plan to put mashed potatoes in a pastry bag and "ice" the meatloaf with potatoes!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy LaBoiteaux

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: These are ideal for Individual small things like corn bread muffins, meat loaf servings, etc. I have an 8-cavity rectangular that I've used for small meat loaves but then, my wife started cutting those in half for a serving so I ordered this smaller cavity pan and it fits my wife's preference for size perfectly. I spray the pans with Pam before filling and the food cooks quicker than it would as a normal loaf would. I've never had a problem removing food from this pan and the dishwasher does a good job of cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan to make biscuits and then I use them to make baked egg cups to go on the biscuits. Add cheese and meat, wrap in wax paper or cling wrap it whatever you like, toss into a Ziploc bag and keep in freezer. Quick and easy breakfast! For some reason, the square pan never sticks, but the round ones sometimes do. I'm ordering a second pan, so I can do the eggs and biscuits at the same time. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kit-Kat74

customer_reviews.title: Update! Do Not Buy! Rusts Bad!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I wrote a good review about a month after I bought the pan but that has changed. I honestly should have updated my review months ago. Around Halloween last year, I noticed that the pan started to rust and now it's rusted bad. It does not last and is a piece of junk. I would not recommend buying this unless you like rust in your brownies. Big Disappointment! This brownie pan is wonderful! It works extremely well. It was easy to get the brownies out without any issue. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Xantea Gunlicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Square Cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and they were all correct. The Pan was super easy to use and clean. Worked perfect to make square cupcakes. I did not use round liners at all. I used a little bit of Pam and poured the cupcake mix in. I do recommend that you only fill the slots half full or a little less if trying to make perfect squares. Otherwise they bubble over on the top. This pan worked perfect! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Arburrin3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brownies
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly portioned brownies. We used good ole boxed brownie mix, set oven at whatever box said and just cooked for half the time. Turned out perfect. Sprayed with cooking spray first and had very minimal sticking, used a small stiff spatula to loosen the edges and each brownie fell right out on plate. To keep the nice nonstick coating, I wouldn’t put through dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Flashmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Square Cupcakes!
customer_reviews.text: I used this pan to make my son a Minecraft sword cake and it turned out wonderfully! The pan was easy to use and clean which I appreciated. I did not use cupcake liners since I liked the look of unlined cupcakes to make up the cake shape. My son has already requested other Minecraft cupcakes and I don't mind since it's a breeze to use this pan!
customer_reviews.author: RiverSong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Brownies and so much more..
customer_reviews.text: Brownie baking just made simple but why stop at Brownies?...Cup Cakes, Biscuits, Rolls, quiche's, meal prep anything you need a single portion size. None stick surface for easy removal and clean up and the perfect perfect portion size. I can't say enough if your a baker home or professional you need this. Excellent Product
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester G

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The brownie pan is just what I wanted. You will find many other uses for it. I already made some corn bread , chocolate cakes, and blueberry muffins.I'm sure you can use it for other things besides desserts. It is a nice change from the usual round ones. The pan is very sturdy and well made so I think it will hold up for a while. It is easy clean up to. I always use Pam on everything and it worked perfectly on this. The squares are a good size and the depth is approx. 1 1/2".
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Varied uses!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to a friend after she saw mine and they have been a big hit in both households! We have come up with numerous ways to use them, including baking stuffed mushrooms to keep them upright, baking "poached" eggs and square muffins, which were fun and a big hit. They still need a little hit of non stick spray, but things pop out really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: So many possibilities!
customer_reviews.text: I received this pan yesterday and used it today to make brownies for my sons halloween party at school. The pan is deep which is perfect because it's going to be great for so many more things other than brownies. I did spray the dish with pam spray and used a rubber spatula to loosen the edges but they came out easy and perfect! Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Gyna

customer_reviews.title: Nice baking sheet...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this baking sheet today, 05/19/2020. It is well made, and high quality, from what I can see. The cups are deep, and should do well for what I want to make with it. I will probably use cooking spray, even though it is nonstick, just as a precaution. Walton, who is the vendor, has made a nice baking sheet in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Sayya2daUPeh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pan for making muffin crisps
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pan that would make a square muffin and this one worked out perfectly. I bake muffins with healthy ingredients,usually adding raisins, walnuts, sunflower seeds and flaxseed. Once they are cooled I slice them very thin and bake them again on parchment paper until crisp. Having a pan with very square dimensions makes the slices very even. Nothing sticks to mine! I do spray the bottom of the cups just in case and my muffins lift right out. Cleaning is very easy with a soft sponge. I would highly recommend this pan and will probably buy another one myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping it would be
customer_reviews.text: I decided to bake for Christmas - lots of simple recipes I'd accumulated over the year. I needed a 'square muffin pan' for one of the recipes. The picture 'looked' like it was very good quality, it 'looked' like it would be nonstick, it 'looked' sturdy, so I ordered it - and I was VERY pleased with the product. It's looks were deceiving, it was actually better than the picture showed; the wells were big enough to put the cookie dough, the peanut butter cup AND pour the brownie mix on top - they came out evenly baked and easily released from the pan. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: RMQ

customer_reviews.title: Great baking pan
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what it is about this baking pan, but the first batch of brownies I made in it, were the best I've ever made. They came out so easily (you do have to spray it with cooking spray first), we are an edge brownie household, with this you get edge on all four sides and they were the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wilton took a beating BUT not Wilton’s fault...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats a Wilton product. This is so no exception. It arrived warped and side handles dented. I adjusted and leveled it as best as I could. As it’s not a Wilton defect but poor packaging from seller. So after fixing it back in shape, I decided to bake in it. Brownies came out perfect and no leftovers. It’s a hit. SELLER PLEASE IMPROVE YOUR SHIPPING.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Doucette

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks!
customer_reviews.text: I have baked two sets of brownies in the pan and blueberry muffins and let me tell you even with using Pam spray what a chore to get them out of the pan! I will be using my 8x8 glass baker Dr my brownies and my muffin tins again and this pan will get put away or thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Very useful pan
customer_reviews.text: I've seen several recipes where the cook used a square brownie pan that I just had to get one. I make no carb biscuits and baking them in this pan gives you the perfect little biscuit for breakfast sandwiches. My husband likes it for his drop biscuits. I'm really surprised how often I use this pan but I do recommend it for e ery kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Guerra

customer_reviews.title: love the brownies this makes
customer_reviews.text: my daughter gave us brownies out of this baking pan. they were so tasty. each brownie had crust on all 4 sides and it made them more delicious. so i sent a pan to my niece so she could make terrific brownies too. i am lazy and wait for them to make me brownies
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lehnert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brownies for families
customer_reviews.text: This pan is fantastic. Bought it to make brownies with my 3 kids (8,6 and 3). Figured it would be fun to decorate their own brownie and then eat it. It’s easy to use, the brownies come out perfectly, and if you spray it first it leaves no mess at all behind on the tray. Love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dabirrs

customer_reviews.title: Individual portions
customer_reviews.text: I saw this pan advertised for brownies and since we all love edge pieces, I purchased it. It works well. We have since used them for individual meatloaf, and corn bread. It does take more time to clean each individual square, wished they made paper liners for this pan.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pan
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome!! Easy to Clean , brownies, mini coffee cakes , everything comes out so easy , and Perfect!!! Love this pan !!!!
customer_reviews.author: tina catyb

customer_reviews.title: Not PC
customer_reviews.text: Makes slightly deeper and smaller squares than the Pampered Chef version. I thought they would be identical. Not so much.
customer_reviews.author: TXShopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my bakery needs, my husband and I love brownies so we make them almost every weekend. I made a mistake of using cooking oil instead of spray and when I was cleaning the tray I got something sticky and it was impossible for me to removed it, if there’s any suggestion on how to removed it I’d love it. So I give all starts because it’s a great thing and the mistake was mine.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Antonacci

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Brownie Pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan makes every brownie an end piece. The brownies come out of the pan by turning it over and rapping it down (sometimes a couple times) on the counter, provided you greased the pan well. I spray bottoms with cooking spray and they wipe all the sides with a paper towel soaked with cooking spray.
customer_reviews.author: Kard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. I can finally make brownies that come out evenly and all the same size. They also look much more neat and presentable for my dessert business. I spray the pan before I pour my mix in and they come out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne W.

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% nonstick, but great!
customer_reviews.text: This tray is awesome for Blondies!! Finally crispy edges on all the Blondies. Be aware it is not 100% nonstick. I place parchment paper on the bottom of each cavity and spray the sides with cooking spray, which help them come out seamlessly. I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Best pan ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing - I use it for everything - great for brownie's because the square shape you want is just there and they come out perfectly every time. But it's also really easy to clean and VERY non stick which is a huge plus for me. I also use this for baking everything else - mini quiches and all kinds of things.
customer_reviews.author: Mom reviewer

customer_reviews.title: good pan
customer_reviews.text: definitely will need to get two boxes of brownies next time to fill all spaces, I also wish I would have seen that there was a 12 cavity one instead of 20, that would have been better for me. But over all this pan does make perfect brownies.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Makes great tasting, chewy brownies!
customer_reviews.text: If you like chewy corner piece brownies this is the pan for you! We use the family size (9x13in) boxes of mix and lots of Pam baking spray and the brownies slide right out. We also wash the pan by hand, not sure if that makes a difference or not.
customer_reviews.author: joec

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect in every way! Each little brownie turns out like a miniature pan of brownies. So cute, and no more messy brownie cutting! Great nonstick surface, I add some cooking spray, and they pop right out! Barely any cleaning needed. Buy it! You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brownie Pan
customer_reviews.text: I really prefer the brownies baked in this pan to ones baked in an 8x8 pan. They all have a nice crunchy crust but soft center. The brownies are easy to remove from the pan. This purchase was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aloc

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great addition to a baking gift basket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend and she LOVES it. It was a birthday gift so I made a little package with different mix-in's and included a homemade brownie recipe. She is using it all the time, and all her friends want to know where to get one. I have a similar one and have used it for brownies and zucchini bread. It's a perfect one portion sized treat. My husband and I don't like some of the same mix-in's so this allows me to make some with my favorite stuff and some with his. Both this pan, and the one I have, recommend not using in the dishwasher so I just hand wash. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The cavities in this pan were larger than I was expecting. Considering that it was one of the least expensive of several similar pans, it is very solid; heavy and well constructed. My dishwasher finds all the square cavities a bit of a pain to hand wash, but the nonstick coating helps make it easier on him. No need to buy others on Amazon for a lot more money; this one more than does the job for a lot less $$.
customer_reviews.author: John-Mark

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to pan
customer_reviews.text: Every batch of brownies stuck to the pan. I used baking spray, not sure if I'm using the wrong product to keep it from sticking but not happy with results. :(
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: MAKES GREAT BROWNIES, PERFECT SIZE, EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED THIS PAN A FEW MONTHS AGO AND I HAVE USED IT SEVERAL TIMES. THE PAN IS AN EXCELLENT QUALITY AND IS A NICE WEIGHT. IT COOKS A PERFECT BROWNIE AND CLEANS SUPER EASILY. THIS IS AN EXCELLENT PAN AND PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brownie bars!
customer_reviews.text: This pan makes perfect brownies. Filling each cavity is a bit time consuming, but using a small measuring scoop helps. Also, I wish there was better information regarding cooking time for brownies made in the pan; I had to wing it.
customer_reviews.author: Keeks Mann

customer_reviews.title: What a little cutie!
customer_reviews.text: Nonstick & heavyweight ! Brownies, pineapple upside down cake... individual meatloafs , mashed potatoes puffs! Honestly just a great little pan to have around.... I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PuppyKisser

customer_reviews.title: Great out the box
customer_reviews.text: Very will made. The idea is not as great as I expected. Also once it was scratched it was over. Any water sits in it and it's like instant rust. That's what I get for letting kids bake I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for brownies and other small cakes
customer_reviews.text: I've made brownies in these and I have made coffee cakes. This pan fits a box of mix exactly if that helps. About three tablespoons of batter in each cavity, it makes a nice little square brownie or cake. Quickbreads, bars or anything with a nice streusel-like topping would look nice made with this.
customer_reviews.author: Evangale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed to make square cupcakes for my son's minecraft themed birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: baydoor’s girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Keto Pan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan because it automatically portions out my keto baked goods-instead of me having to cut them out of a large pan. I make keto brownies yesterday and a few weeks ago I made keto blueberry crumble bars. So easy to clean and it is non-stick so it drops right out of the pan. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HockeyMom

customer_reviews.title: Brownies were delicious
customer_reviews.text: Loved that the brownies were all the same size and cooked evenly. Had a hard time finding how long to cook them and messed up the first batch but found 24 minutes at 375 degrees worked beautifully. Used two tablespoon (medium) cookie scoop with two scoops per section.
customer_reviews.author: Val Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I made square cupcakes using the extra large liners so I could create a Minecraft cupcake cake and they were just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Stump

customer_reviews.title: Perfect single serving size
customer_reviews.text: Like any multi serving pan, it is time consuming to clean each space. But pan is heavy duty and brownies came out easily. Kiss loved the personal size and each one had that little bit of crunchiness to the edges. The first one came with the finish damaged. Contacted Amazon and they replaced it no questions asked. Very quick exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Wilton
customer_reviews.text: There are some things that when you see the name you expect quality. Wilton is one of those. There has been Wilton baking products in our family for at least the past 50 years. This pan is great for making small portion veggie muffins or cookie bars or whatever you come up with. It’s great for portion control and cleans up quite easily. My wife absolutely loves it and uses it quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST addition to your kitchen! Many uses!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent baking pan! Items do not stick inside and the squares are a prefect size for a single serving! I use the pan to make individual egg bake bites, you can make an standard egg bake recipe and place into each square instead of a full size pan. Also great for corn Bread!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Schleif

customer_reviews.title: I love these pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans! I use a little more cooking spray on them than I would on a regular baking dish because I always want to make sure all four sides of each hole are coated, and I’ve never had any sticking or burning. I bought three of these and I use them for muffins, brownies, corn bread, and even little square cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect sized, all edge brownies. Very easy to remove, no sticking at all. Slightly difficult to clean just because you are cleaning 12 individual cups and each has a bit of a rim that some batter was stuck in. The non stick coating definitely helped though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not non stick
customer_reviews.text: Love the size...however they stick!! They even stuck after I sprayed Pam on them
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! I bake my brownies at 325° For 25 minutes and they turn out absolutely perfect. I use non-stick cooking spray and if you loosen each side of the brownie they’ll come right out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli4781

customer_reviews.title: I want re-purchase it’s DOUBLE THE PRICE !!!
customer_reviews.text: Original price that I purchased at was at $10.83 Product was delivered damaged And now that I want re-purchase it’s DOUBLE THE PRICE !!! Ridiculous! This was literally about a week ago.! NOT BUYING THIS AGAIN !
customer_reviews.author: perla

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Makes the most darling cupcakes and brownies. But is also great for tiny meatloaves. I've also used it for corn bread. The family like the brownies best, cause everyone get's the crusty edges.
customer_reviews.author: Book a holic

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make personal size coffee cakes. Works like a charm. Very heavyweight so it should last a long time. Met and exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft square cakes
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make individual minecraft birthday cakes. Seemed to cook faster than the round cupcake tins. Love all my Wilton pans.
customer_reviews.author: toni nelson

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: Its a good pan. Easy to clean, but its not as "non stick" as I would hope. Still had to pry the brownies out with a plastic utensil so I didn't scratch the pan.
customer_reviews.author: LoriL9182

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Great pan. I make brownies a lot and this makes serving so much easier and nicer. I do usually cut them in half but occasionally I let my guest do it if they would like a smaller portion. Again, since all sides come out even, they make a great presentation and everyone gets a crust!
customer_reviews.author: Lorgunhub1

customer_reviews.title: It’s hip to be square!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite baking pan. It washes well and everything that comes out of it is yummy with crispy sides. There are a lot of ways you could use this thing for holidays, games and birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: watch baking times
customer_reviews.text: The pan is sturdy and the non-stick coating work well. I will caution bakers that most recipes call for longer baking time than you need with this pan due to the individual size.
customer_reviews.author: rowtreeman

customer_reviews.title: Not a Lightweight Pan
customer_reviews.text: If you prefer your baking pans to be a bit heavier than the usual, off-the-shelf purchases, which I do, this one is for you. It is not a pan to fit in a small oven, but a very good, solid pan that produces very good results.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Worthington

customer_reviews.title: NOT just a square muffin pan :)
customer_reviews.text: My son teased me and said it was just a square muffin pan, so I made one in the muffin pan and one in this. The difference was night and day! We used the Ghiradelli Dark Chocolate Brownie mix and the muffin pan brownie was mushy and just not the same as the yumminess that came out of this pan. I don't know how, but it is 10 times better and I don't care about the science :-P
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Cordero

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life! This pan is fantastic! Cooks wonderfully with those crispy edges everyone loves, very easy to clean, and the portion sizes are perfect. Just buy it, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: SEAL2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for brownies
customer_reviews.text: I just use it for brownies and it does them very well. Someone else used them for square cupcakes and they worked but they were a bit messy. I am old school and butter the sides and bottom of a pan when making brownies and they have always come right out. I wash this pan by hand and it cleans up easily and completely. Oh, and the brownies it makes are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gee

customer_reviews.title: Great uses
customer_reviews.text: It works good for making individual cake for wrapping & storing. So for two people who has trouble eating a whole cake before it goes bad, I'm able make some for now, some to wrap & refrigerate for later & some left to wrap & freeze. It also works for bake sales.
customer_reviews.author: polymy10

customer_reviews.title: Love the size.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pan almost everyday since I purchased it. No more round cupcakes. Small mini-cakes are the best! Everyone loves the size and shape. Great for small baked items and is perfect for individual casseroles.
customer_reviews.author: D. Madewell

customer_reviews.title: Makes great square cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an order I had for a minecraft sword....I was a little skeptical about using this pan for cupcakes, but I checked out the reviews and decided to try. Works out awesome. I used circular liners and the same amount of batter as regular pan. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Get 4 crunchy edges!
customer_reviews.text: Yum. Each of my brownies had 4 corners of crunchy edges. If not sprayed with oil before hand one might have trouble removing the brownies.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Great brownie pan for portion control and uniformity
customer_reviews.text: Very very good brownie pan. You get the best of everything in each brownie. Crusty crunchy corners, check. Gooey melty middles, check. Noone fighting over the edge or middle pieces, check. Really strong and a great non stick coating that doesn’t scratch. Hope this helped
customer_reviews.author: Pancho Villa

customer_reviews.title: Wilton buy worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my brownie pan. I've made granola too. Mini cakes are just the per2aize when I bake. Worth the buy. It's wilton!!
customer_reviews.author: Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty baking pan
customer_reviews.text: Nice for baking brownies and other treats where you want every piece to be an edge piece. Cooks brownies in 1/2 the time of a usual brownie pan.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Helped a novice baker like me to make professional looking brownies! Each one is perfectly square and crispy on all sides due to the pan shape.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Best brownies ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pans for my party; I wanted the perfect brownies. they came out Amazing and I had no hassle getting the brownies out of the pan. Everyone loved them and wanted to know how I did it. I even went ahead and got my mom a pan.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted to order. My boyfriend loves the brownie edges and this makes them perfectly. Plus the center ended up still really soft.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Don't fill to the top!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great for brownies that all have crispy edges, just a word of warning, don't fill it the spaces up all the way or it'll be hard to get the brownies out.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: Where has this pan been all my life. I researched several and decided on this one. Glad I did. No spraying needed and they all fall out every time.
customer_reviews.author: sherry beasley

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to make a Minecraft cake.
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous using a cupcake pan without liners, but it all worked out in the end. (I used Baker's Joy spray btw) They were SO square. It was really cool. Best $16 I've spent in a long whole.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to make cupcakes and I love the square look. Brings a new touch to my cake table set up for parties!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Worth the work!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Portion size seemed like it wouldn’t be enough before baking, but each rose to the correct height! I had a very difficult time removing the brownies 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for making brownies and it works great. I may even use it for making individual meat loaves!
customer_reviews.author: Fae

customer_reviews.title: Best tin/pan I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing sticks. At all! Perfect portions for individual cakes or brownies. Heat seems to go perfectly evenly as well. Never have some more done than others as I have with other tins.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra v andrews

product_meta.title: Wilton Brownie Bar Pan
product_meta.description: Style:NonstickBrownies that you don't have to cut taste even better. With this non-stick Wilton brownie pan, you can make perfect individual brownies and cookie bars and enjoy them almost instantly. Can also be used for small square cupcakes, muffins or mini cakes.
feature_bullets: This pan is perfect for making individual brownies squares, bar cookies or mini cakes
Made of steel; non-stick coating for easy release and quick cleanup
Pan dimensions: 11 x 16 in. (27.9 x 40.6 cm); Cavity size: 2.75 x 1.5 in. (6.9 x 3.8 cm)
Dishwasher safe; however for best results, wash in warm, soapy water before first and after each use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,955 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
